item.title: Deep pothole beside bus stop E, Finchley Road, 3rd January
item.description:
This pothole is enlarging, probably because buses have to drive over it to get to bus stop E. It's a danger to cyclists and especially pedestrians crossing the road to reach the bus stop.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Finchley Road, Golders Green, Greater London

item.title: Box dumped next to bins, 3rd January
item.description:
Box seen being dumped by man last week. Put next to bins presumably in the hope binmen would take it. Bins collected this morning and box remains uncollected on pavement as fly tipping. Location: junction of Queens Parade Close N11 3DA and Hollyfield Avenue, N11 3BY

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Queen's Parade Close, Friern Barnet, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
